definition.@value: MURCS association, which stands for Müllerian duct aplasia (MU), congenital renal dysplasia (R), cervical somite anomalies (CS), is the atypical (or type II) form of Mayer-Rokitansky-Küster-Hauser syndrome, characterised by utero-vaginal atresia in otherwise normal females as well associated kidney and skeletal abnormalities and hearing problems.

fullySpecifiedName.@value: Müllerian aplasia - renal aplasia - cervicothoracic somite dysplasia

label.@value: Klippel-Feil deformity - conductive deafness - absent vagina
